title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

An assembly room, within the meaning of this statute, means
a room where the pupils are brought together for the purpose of assemblage on
special occasions. Neither a classroom nor a study hall is necessarily an
assembly room. In schools having an auditorium, such auditorium is the assembly
room contemplated by the statute. In schools having but few classrooms, the
room used for general assembly purposes should contain the flag. In
schoolhouses having but one room, that room is the assembly room within the
meaning of the statute. Notes

108.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
